fields.name: attendees
fields.title: Attendees
fields.description: A collection of person or organization attending the event.

fields.name: startTime
fields.title: Start Time
fields.description: The start time of the event.

fields.name: endTime
fields.title: End Time
fields.description: The end time of the event.

fields.name: eventStatus
fields.title: Event Status
fields.description: An eventStatus of an event represents its status; particularly useful when an event is cancelled or rescheduled.

fields.name: performers
fields.title: Performers
fields.description: The main performer or performers of the eventâ€”for example, a presenter, musician, or actor (legacy spelling; see singular form, performer).

fields.name: previousStartDate
fields.title: Previous Start Date
fields.description: Used in conjunction with eventStatus for rescheduled or cancelled events. This property contains the previously scheduled start date. For rescheduled events, the startDate property should be used for the newly scheduled start date. In the (rare) case of an event that has been postponed and rescheduled multiple times, this field may be repeated.

fields.name: subEvents
fields.title: Sub Events
fields.description: Events that are a part of this event. For example, a conference event includes many presentations, each are subEvents of the conference (legacy spelling; see singular form, subEvent).
